item.title: Release notes from neovim: Nvim development (prerelease) build
item.content:encoded:
NVIM v0.11.0-dev-1418+g557f2d9700
Build type: RelWithDebInfo
LuaJIT 2.1.1734355927

Install

Windows

Zip

  1. Download nvim-win64.zip
  2. Extract the zip
  3. Run nvim.exe on your CLI of choice

MSI

  1. Download nvim-win64.msi
  2. Run the MSI
  3. Run nvim.exe on your CLI of choice

Note: On Windows "Server" you may need to install vcruntime140.dll.

macOS (x86_64)

  1. Download nvim-macos-x86_64.tar.gz
  2. Run xattr -c ./nvim-macos-x86_64.tar.gz (to avoid "unknown developer" warning)
  3. Extract: tar xzvf nvim-macos-x86_64.tar.gz
  4. Run ./nvim-macos-x86_64/bin/nvim

macOS (arm64)

  1. Download nvim-macos-arm64.tar.gz
  2. Run xattr -c ./nvim-macos-arm64.tar.gz (to avoid "unknown developer" warning)
  3. Extract: tar xzvf nvim-macos-arm64.tar.gz
  4. Run ./nvim-macos-arm64/bin/nvim

Linux (x64)

glibc 2.31 or newer is required. Or you may try the (unsupported) builds for older glibc.

AppImage

  1. Download nvim.appimage
  2. Run chmod u+x nvim.appimage && ./nvim.appimage
    • If your system does not have FUSE you can extract the appimage: 
      ./nvim.appimage --appimage-extract
./squashfs-root/usr/bin/nvim

Tarball

  1. Download nvim-linux64.tar.gz
  2. Extract: tar xzvf nvim-linux64.tar.gz
  3. Run ./nvim-linux64/bin/nvim

Other

  • Install by package manager

SHA256 Checksums

4a7b8108fc6400656e787c396c3d557994b54f5920757f66cb5cb96324d960e1  nvim-linux64.tar.gz
c15d2629c37423f60894ec05e995f7f82d8ce0bef8dcab2134684251b8e8cb7e  nvim.appimage
7fd8b7d1a25c5cc214b6431fdeb4d8e83618566fa6aa297fcaa0901e66b4c02b  nvim.appimage.zsync
8ed42a02a1ad48669a3124ebf5ba77df6f4fd197eb0fddbbf75dce0a7817b899  nvim-macos-x86_64.tar.gz
08ae49a381231fc6c333a13e30f1569d8db33c86ed8a75587b02210ff0062153  nvim-macos-arm64.tar.gz
8445d86349489c6a01ee7cc57ef7ddd47737b2ca7f4295844a908e426757a812  nvim-win64.zip
581d79561f51baa02a359d564e77a14032cc7844d6cd26bc7fe2931d1a3cc71c  nvim-win64.msi

item.title: Release notes from selenium: Nightly
item.content:encoded:
Commits

  • c2d859c: [java] Fix FedCM command definition and tests (#14070) (Christian Biesinger) #14070
  • cfa5959: [java] Disabling Firefox Beta test (Diego Molina)
  • b49678d: [ci] Running format script (Diego Molina)
  • dc952cd: [grid] Improve SlotMatcher and SlotSelector on request browserVersion (#14914) (Viet Nguyen Duc) #14914
  • 983a43e: [grid] Using the correct variable in throw (Diego Molina)
  • 59f090b: [dotnet] Align WebDriver errors with specification (#14936) (Michael Render) #14936
  • eaf4fa7: [dotnet] Add nullability to IniFileReader (#14929) (Michael Render) #14929
  • 7d5a9e4: [dotnet][rb][java][js][py] Automated Browser Version Update (#14778) (Selenium CI Bot) #14778
  • 66e96fd: [java] for loop enhance and using of standard java 11 method writeString for tests (#14889) (Alex) #14889

item.title: Release notes from zed: collab-staging: Update Rust crate async-broadcast to v0.7.2 (#22424)
item.content:encoded:
This PR contains the following updates:

Package Type Update Change
async-broadcast
dependencies patch 0.7.1 -> 0.7.2

Release Notes

smol-rs/async-broadcast (async-broadcast)

v0.7.2

Compare
Source

  • Add Sender::broadcast_blocking and Receiver::recv_blocking.
    #‚Äã41
  • Use Mutex instead of RwLock for securing the inner data.
    #‚Äã42
  • Many non-user-facing internal improvements and fixes.

Configuration

America/New_York, Automerge - At any time (no schedule defined).

are satisfied.

rebase/retry checkbox.

again.

item.title: Release notes from next.js: v15.1.3
item.content:encoded:
Note

This release is backporting bug fixes. It does not include all pending features/changes on canary.

Core Changes

  • Retry manifest file loading only in dev mode: #73900
  • Use shared worker for lint & typecheck steps: #74154

Credits

Huge thanks to @unstubbable and @ztanner for helping!

item.title: Release notes from next.js: v14.2.22
item.content:encoded:
Note

This release is backporting bug fixes. It does not include all pending features/changes on canary.

Core Changes

  • Retry manifest file loading only in dev mode: #73900
  • Ensure workers are cleaned up: #71564
  • Use shared worker for lint & typecheck steps: #74154

Credits

Huge thanks to @unstubbable, @ijjk, and @ztanner for helping!

item.title: Release notes from automq: 1.3.1-rc1
item.content:encoded:
What's Changed

  • feat: support backpressure by @Chillax-0v0 in #2236
  • feat(table): cherry table topic aspect by @superhx in #2237
  • feat(stream): exponential backoff retry by @superhx in #2239
  • feat(config): add table topic conversion type configuration (#2203) by @Gezi-lzq in #2240
  • fix(s3stream): report compaction delay after two compaction period by @SCNieh in #2242

Full Changelog: 1.3.1-rc0...1.3.1-rc1

item.title: Release notes from xstate: xstate@5.19.1
item.content:encoded:
Patch Changes

  • #5139 bf6119a7310a878afbf4f5b01f5e24288f9a0f16 Thanks @SandroMaglione! - Make spawn input required when defined inside referenced actor:

    const childMachine = createMachine({
  types: { input: {} as { value: number } }
});

const machine = createMachine({
  types: {} as { context: { ref: ActorRefFrom<typeof childMachine> } },
  context: ({ spawn }) => ({
    ref: spawn(
      childMachine,
      // Input is now required!
      { input: { value: 42 } }
    )
  })
});
